bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with er long 耳聾② , deafness. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry gua lou gen 栝樓根 quotes Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 : 治二三年聾耳方：栝樓根三十斤細切之，以水煮，用釀酒如 常法，久久服之 , “Recipe for ears that have been deaf for two to three years: Prepare a fine cut of 30 jin of gua lou root, boil in water, and prepare a [medicinal] wine from this according to the usual method. Ingest for a very long time”.
